gobblin.runtime.std

Class DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.std.DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobCatalogListener, JobExecutionStateListener, JobLifecycleListener, JobSpecSchedulerListener

    public class DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl
extends Object
implements JobLifecycleListener
    Default NOOP implementation for JobLifecycleListener. It can log the callbacks. Other implementing classes can use this as a base to override only the methods they care about.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobLifecycleListener

        JobLifecycleListener.JobLaunchCallback

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobCatalogListener

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobSpecSchedulerListener

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobExecutionStateListener

        JobExecutionStateListener.MetadataChangeCallback, JobExecutionStateListener.StageTransitionCallback, JobExecutionStateListener.StatusChangeCallback
